newsArray.title: Bougherra : « Les erreurs font partie du jeu »
creator: Akram D
newsArray.description: L’équipe nationale algérienne des locaux a été tenue en échec par l’Afrique du Sud (1-1), ce jeudi, lors de la 2e journée du groupe C du CHAN 2025. Un résultat frustrant au vu du scénario, mais qui permet aux hommes de Madjid Bougherra de rester bien placés dans la course à la qualification pour les quarts de finale.The post Bougherra : « Les erreurs font partie du jeu » appeared first on Football Algérien - DZFOOT.COM.

newsArray.title: Football League buildup and latest news – matchday live
creator: Yara El-Shaboury
newsArray.description: News and discussion as we count down to the actionGet in touch | Check out the day’s upcoming fixturesGood morning and welcome to our very first matchday live of 2025-26! Here you can get all the latest news and updates from me and our correspondents as we countdown to the start of the Football League season.We want you to get involved too so get in touch either below the line or via email and let me know what your football plans are for the day, your hopes and dreams for the season (and how realistic they may or may not be) and any personal pre-season rituals. newsArray.description: Футболистът на Локомотив София Анте Аралица разкри, че работи много добре и професионално с треньора Станислав Генчев.В годините далеч от България нападателят прекара в Румъния, Албания и Полша. newsArray.title: Hutter: Pogba Extremely Eager, Motivated To Play For Monaco
creator: Austin Akhilomen
newsArray.description: AS Monaco coach Adi Hutter says Paul Pogba is extremely motivated and eager to play football again. The former Manchester United and Juventus midfielder signed for ASM this summer after missing the last two seasons due to a doping suspension. Hutter told Cronache di Spogliatoio: “We all know how difficult Pogba has been: two years [...]The post Hutter: Pogba Extremely Eager, Motivated To Play For Monaco appeared first on Complete Sports.

creator: ALEX ISABOKE
newsArray.description: NAIROBI, Kenya, Aug 9 – Harambee Stars skipper Abud Omar has appreciated the Video Assistant Referee (VAR) for coming to their rescue severally in their debut at the ongoing Africa Nations Championship (CHAN) at the Moi International Sports Center Kasarani. VAR has come in handy for co-hosts Kenya, with the latest coming on Thursday night [...]The post Dear VAR We Appreciate You: Harambee Stars Captain Abud Posts appeared first on Capital Sports.
